base_url.description: Base URL for websim, required if you don't want to have requests sent to localhost

model_id.description: Model ID, a free model is recommended

cookies.description: Cookies, paste from browser with document.cookies, required to work

auto_response_prefix.description: Automatic Reponse prefix is checked for if a comment requires processing.

auto_response_create_revision.description: Automatic response when a revision is created, auto_response_prefix is automatically prepended.

auto_response_require_likes.description: Automatic response when the comment author didn't like the project when it is required

require_like_project.description: Optional, require likes toggle, defaults to false

require_tip_credit.description: Optional, require tip toggle, defaults to false

minimum_tip_amount.description: Minimum tipped credit needed on the comment

auto_response_require_tip.description: Automatic Response When the comment author didn't tip the project when it is required. <$MINIMUM_TIP_COUNT> will be replaced with the minimum tip amount.
